com.github.katjahahn.parser.msdos

Class MSDOSLoadModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.katjahahn.parser.msdos.MSDOSLoadModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PEModule

    public class MSDOSLoadModule
extends java.lang.Object
implements PEModule
    Responsible for dumping the MSDOS load module. This class might be removed in future versions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MSDOSLoadModule(MSDOSHeader header, java.io.File file)
      Creates the MSDOSLoadModule instance based on the MSDOSHeader of the given file
